dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: ECO Cement; Green Cement; Sustainable Cement; Composite Cement; Blended Cement; Low-Clinker Cement; Environmental-friendly Cement; Alternative Binders
ECO Cement; Green Cement; Sustainable Cement; Composite Cement; Blended Cement; Low-Clinker Cement; Environmental-friendly Cement; Alternative Binders
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This product flow refers to a type of cement that includes 21-35% of alternative constituents. These might be materials such as fly ash, granulated blast furnace slag, or silica fume, and are integrated into the cement during production. The detailed description would cover the processing level, technical specifications including the treatment it has received, whether it adheres to certain standards, its quality, usage, the method of production, the specific alternative constituents used (educt name), and the stage of distribution like whether it's provided to consumers or available at the plant.
该产品流指的是一种包含21-35%替代成分的水泥。这些可能是如粉煤灰、颗粒高炉矿渣或微硅粉等材料，并在生产过程中与水泥一起混合。详细描述将涵盖加工水平、技术规格（包括所接受的处理）、是否遵循某些标准、其质量、使用方式、生产方法、使用的具体替代成分（原料名称），以及分销阶段，比如是提供给消费者还是在工厂现场可得。
